name: Rykaria's Strangely Draconic Undercloak
body:
Usage worn on shoulders; Bulk L
-
Appears as a normal aqua undercloak with a slightly shimmery vibe. It looks nifty. Compliments the scales for damned sure.
-
Level 1:
**Feather Steps**
Traits Air, Transmutation
While wearing the relic, you do not trigger traps that use weight or pressure plates as a trigger. Also, whenever you fall, you reduce the falling damage by the level of the relic. If this would reduce the falling damage to 0, you land on your feet and are not prone. The relic grants a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks made to Jump, increasing to +2 at 9th level and +3 at 17th level.
-
Level 5: 
**Wind Barrier**
Traits Abjuration Air
Activate (A) command; 
Effect An invisible barrier of air deflects ranged attacks, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks until the beginning of your next turn. At 13th level, this increases to a +3 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.
-
Level 9: 
**Lightning Storm**
Traits Air, Electricity, Evocation
Activate (AA) command; 
Effect The relic surrounds you with a storm of wind, rain, and lightning in a 30-foot emanation. This storm is difficult terrain for creatures other than you. Any creature other than you that enters or starts its turn in the storm takes 1d12 electricity damage, with a basic Reflex save (2d12 damage at 15th level). You can Sustain this Activation up to 1 minute.
-
Level 13: 
**Track of the Beast**
Traits Transmutation
The spirit of an animal fills you. The relic gives one a +10-foot status bonus to your land Speed.
-
Level 17: 
**Living Storm**
Traits Air, Electricity, Evocation
The relic grants you a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 60 feet, whichever is greater. In addition, a creature that Strikes you with a melee attack takes 5 electricity damage, and you can cast 5th-level lightning bolt as an innate spell.
